verb.description: (of people) gather together in one place for a common purpose.
examples: a crowd had assembled outside the gates

verb.description: Fit together the separate component parts of (a machine or other object)
examples: a factory that assembled parts for trucks

verb.description: Translate (a program) from a higher-level programming language into machine code.
examples: assemble the program and produce a file suitable to input to the simulator

origin: Middle English: from Old French asembler, based on Latin ad- to + simul together.
